Package id.passageidentity.passage4j.core.app

Interface User

public interface User
Interface representing user-related operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    UserBean
    activate(String userID)
    Activates a user with the specified ID.
    UserBean
    create(CreateUserBodyBean createUserBodyBean)
    Creates a new user using the provided create user body.
    UserBean
    deactivate(String userID)
    Deactivates a user with the specified ID.

    Deletes a user with the specified ID.

    getInfo(String userID)
    Retrieves information about a user with the specified ID.

    listDevices(String userID)
    Retrieves the list of devices associated with the user with the specified ID.
    boolean

    Revokes the device with the specified ID for the user with the specified ID.
    boolean

    Signs out the user with the specified ID.

    Updates a user with the specified ID using the provided update body.

  • Method Details

    • getInfo

      UserBean getInfo(String userID) throws PassageException
      Retrieves information about a user with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      the UserBean containing the user information
      Throws:
      PassageException - if an error occurs during the operation

      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user to activate
      Returns:
      the UserBean containing the updated user information
      Throws:
      PassageException - if an error occurs during the operation

      userID - the ID of the user to deactivate
      Returns:
      the UserBean containing the updated user information
      Throws:
      PassageException - if an error occurs during the operation

    • update

      UserBean update(String userID, UpdateBodyBean updateBody) throws PassageException
      Updates a user with the specified ID using the provided update body.
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user to update
      updateBody - the update body containing the new user information
      Returns:
      the UserBean containing the updated user information
      Throws:
      PassageException - if an error occurs during the operation

    • delete

      boolean delete(String userID) throws PassageException
      Deletes a user with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user to delete
      Returns:
      true if the user is successfully deleted, false otherwise
      Throws:
      PassageException - if an error occurs during the operation

    • create

      UserBean create(CreateUserBodyBean createUserBodyBean) throws PassageException
      Creates a new user using the provided create user body.
      Parameters:
      createUserBodyBean - the create user body containing the user information
      Returns:
      the UserBean containing the created user information
      Throws:
      PassageException - if an error occurs during the operation

    • listDevices

      List<DeviceBean> listDevices(String userID) throws PassageException
      Retrieves the list of devices associated with the user with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      the list of DeviceBean objects representing the user's devices
      Throws:
      PassageException - if an error occurs during the operation

    • revokeDevice

      boolean revokeDevice(String userID, String deviceID) throws PassageException
      Revokes the device with the specified ID for the user with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user
      deviceID - the ID of the device to revoke
      Returns:
      true if the device is successfully revoked, false otherwise
      Throws:
      PassageException - if an error occurs during the operation

    • signOut

      boolean signOut(String userID) throws PassageException
      Signs out the user with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user to sign out
      Returns:
      true if the user is successfully signed out, false otherwise
      Throws:
      PassageException - if an error occurs during the operation
